Profile

I'm Ben. I'm a 26 year old software developer and former physicist. I like understanding how things work and making new things.

My primary interest is in using technology to improve decision-making in everyday life. This forms the underlying theme for my writing which covers psychological fact-findings, musings and software engineering posts.

When I'm not in front of a computer screen you might be able to catch me meditating, on the road, running, painting or doing some dancing.

If you want to connect, you can click on my . Alternatively if you're looking for software projects you can check me out on Github.
